_meta.title: Family & Home Life 가정운
_meta.description: Family dynamics, home harmony, and generational wisdom through tarot

The Fool.family_meaning: New beginnings in family life. Fresh start in household dynamics. Welcome new family members or move.
The Fool.korean: 가정생활에서의 새로운 시작. 가정 역학에서 새로운 시작. 새 가족 구성원을 환영하거나 이사.
The Fool.children: New adventures with children. Support their exploration.
The Fool.home: Consider a new home or fresh start in current space.
The Fool.advice: Approach family with fresh eyes. Let go of old family patterns.

The Magician.family_meaning: Take initiative in family matters. You have the skills to improve home life. Communication creates change.
The Magician.korean: 가족 문제에서 주도권을 잡으세요. 가정 생활을 개선할 기술이 있습니다.
The Magician.parents: Use your skills to bridge generational gaps.
The Magician.children: Teach and empower your children with your abilities.
The Magician.home: Create the home environment you want through action.
The Magician.advice: You have the power to transform your family dynamics.

The High Priestess.family_meaning: Family secrets may surface. Trust intuition about family matters. Hidden family history affects present.
The High Priestess.korean: 가족 비밀이 드러날 수 있습니다. 가족 문제에 대한 직감을 신뢰하세요.
The High Priestess.parents: Unspoken family history influences present dynamics.
The High Priestess.children: Listen to what children don't say. Intuition matters.
The High Priestess.home: The home holds hidden memories and energies.
The High Priestess.advice: Trust your intuition about family matters. Listen to what's unsaid.

The Empress.family_meaning: Nurturing energy fills the home. Fertility and motherhood highlighted. Create a beautiful, abundant home.
The Empress.korean: 양육 에너지가 집을 채웁니다. 출산과 모성이 강조됩니다.
The Empress.parents: Mother figures are especially important now.
The Empress.children: Nurture children with abundance of love and care.
The Empress.home: Create beauty and comfort in your home. Abundance flows.
The Empress.advice: Let your home be a garden of love and nurturing.

The Emperor.family_meaning: Structure and authority in family. Father figure energy. Set rules and boundaries. Provide stability.
The Emperor.korean: 가족에서의 구조와 권위. 아버지 상 에너지. 규칙과 경계 설정. 안정성 제공.
The Emperor.parents: Father figures are important. Authority balanced with care.
The Emperor.children: Provide structure and guidance for children.
The Emperor.home: Establish order and security in the household.
The Emperor.advice: Lead your family with fair authority and protective love.

The Hierophant.family_meaning: Family traditions and values. Respect elders. Religious or cultural family practices. Seek family wisdom.
The Hierophant.korean: 가족 전통과 가치. 어른을 공경하세요. 종교적 또는 문화적 가족 관행.
The Hierophant.children: Teach children family values and heritage.
The Hierophant.home: Home as a place of tradition and shared values.
The Hierophant.advice: Honor family traditions while creating your own meaningful rituals.

The Lovers.family_meaning: Important family decisions. Choices affect the whole family. Partnership and family harmony.
The Lovers.korean: 중요한 가족 결정. 선택이 온 가족에게 영향을 미칩니다.
The Lovers.home: Home where love and harmony flourish.
The Lovers.advice: Family decisions work best when made in harmony with loved ones.

The Chariot.family_meaning: Determination moves family forward. Overcome family challenges. Family works toward common goals.
The Chariot.korean: 결단력이 가족을 앞으로 이동시킵니다. 가족 문제 극복.
The Chariot.parents: Drive family progress while honoring different needs.
The Chariot.home: Family moving forward together toward goals.
The Chariot.advice: Lead your family with determination toward shared goals.

Strength.family_meaning: Patience with family. Handle conflicts with gentleness. Inner strength supports family harmony.
Strength.korean: 가족에 대한 인내. 갈등을 부드럽게 처리하세요.
Strength.children: Gentle firmness with children. Compassionate boundaries.
Strength.home: Peaceful home through strength of character.
Strength.advice: The strongest families are built on patience and compassion.

The Hermit.family_meaning: Need space from family. Wisdom from solitude. Family elder wisdom. Privacy at home.
The Hermit.korean: 가족으로부터 공간이 필요합니다. 고독에서 오는 지혜.
The Hermit.children: Allow children privacy and independent growth.
The Hermit.home: Create quiet, reflective spaces at home.
The Hermit.advice: Sometimes family members need space to find themselves.

Wheel of Fortune.family_meaning: Family circumstances changing. Generational cycles turn. Accept family changes as part of life's flow.
Wheel of Fortune.korean: 가족 상황이 변하고 있습니다. 세대 순환이 돌아갑니다.
Wheel of Fortune.home: Home circumstances shifting. Flow with changes.
Wheel of Fortune.advice: Family life moves in cycles. Trust the changes.

Justice.family_meaning: Fairness in family matters. Inheritance and family responsibilities. Balance family duties.
Justice.korean: 가족 문제에서의 공정함. 상속과 가족 책임. 가족 의무 균형.
Justice.parents: Fair treatment of and by parents.
Justice.children: Equal treatment of children. Fairness teaches values.
Justice.advice: Treat all family members fairly. Justice creates harmony.

The Hanged Man.family_meaning: Pause in family matters. See family from new perspective. Sacrifice for family good.
The Hanged Man.korean: 가족 문제에서의 일시정지. 새로운 관점에서 가족을 보세요.
The Hanged Man.parents: See parents differently. Understand their perspective.
The Hanged Man.children: Pause before reacting to children. New viewpoint needed.
The Hanged Man.home: Home life in suspension. Wait for clarity.
The Hanged Man.advice: Sometimes you need to see your family with completely new eyes.

Death.family_meaning: Family transformation. End of one family phase, beginning of another. Let go of old family dynamics.
Death.korean: 가족 변화. 한 가족 단계의 끝, 다른 단계의 시작.
Death.advice: Family roles must transform as people grow. Let change happen.

Temperance.family_meaning: Balance in family life. Harmony between work and family. Blend different family member needs.
Temperance.korean: 가정생활에서의 균형. 일과 가족 사이의 조화.
Temperance.parents: Patient, balanced approach to parent relationships.
Temperance.children: Balance children's needs with other responsibilities.
Temperance.advice: Family harmony comes through patient balancing of everyone's needs.

The Devil.family_meaning: Unhealthy family patterns. Codependency or toxic dynamics. Breaking generational chains.
The Devil.korean: 건강하지 못한 가족 패턴. 공동의존 또는 독성 역학. 세대 간 사슬 끊기.
The Devil.parents: Examine inherited negative patterns from parents.
The Devil.children: Don't pass on unhealthy patterns to children.
The Devil.advice: Name the unhealthy family patterns. You can break the chain.

The Tower.family_meaning: Sudden family upheaval. Family secrets revealed. Crisis leads to truth.
The Tower.korean: 갑작스러운 가족 격변. 가족 비밀 폭로. 위기가 진실로 이어집니다.
The Tower.parents: Relationship with parents shaken or revealed.
The Tower.children: Children may face sudden changes. Support them.
The Tower.home: Household disruption. Home may literally change.
The Tower.advice: Family crises reveal truth. Rebuild on authentic foundations.

The Star.family_meaning: Hope for family. Healing of family wounds. Renewed faith in family bonds.
The Star.korean: 가족에 대한 희망. 가족 상처의 치유. 가족 유대에 대한 새로운 믿음.
The Star.children: Hope for children's future. Inspire them.
The Star.home: Home filled with hope and healing energy.
The Star.advice: Keep hope for your family. Healing is happening.

The Moon.family_meaning: Family confusion or hidden issues. Trust intuition about family. Subconscious family patterns.
The Moon.korean: 가족 혼란 또는 숨겨진 문제. 가족에 대한 직감을 신뢰하세요.
The Moon.parents: Unclear dynamics with parents. Hidden feelings.
The Moon.children: Children's fears or unspoken needs. Listen deeply.
The Moon.advice: Navigate family confusion with intuition. Truth will emerge.

The Sun.family_meaning: Family joy and celebration. Happy home. Children thrive. Success in family life.
The Sun.korean: 가족의 기쁨과 축하. 행복한 가정. 자녀 번창. 가정생활의 성공.
The Sun.advice: Celebrate your family. Joy is the best medicine for home life.

Judgement.family_meaning: Family reckoning. Ancestral healing. Answer the call to heal family patterns.
Judgement.korean: 가족 결산. 조상 치유. 가족 패턴을 치유하라는 부름에 응답하세요.
Judgement.parents: Past family karma resolves. Ancestral healing.
Judgement.children: Raise children to a higher standard.
Judgement.advice: Answer the call to heal your family lineage.

The World.family_meaning: Family fulfillment. Generational legacy complete. Whole, harmonious family.
The World.korean: 가족 성취. 세대 유산 완성. 온전하고 조화로운 가족.
The World.children: Children launched successfully into the world.
The World.home: Home is a complete, fulfilled space.
The World.advice: Celebrate family achievements. You've built something beautiful.

generational_patterns.ancestral_healing: Major Arcana often indicate generational patterns that can be healed
generational_patterns.inherited_traits: Court cards may represent family members or inherited personality traits
generational_patterns.family_karma: Justice and Judgement often point to family karma requiring attention
